level.heading: Location of business incubators.
level.text: The Mayor shall locate business incubators in areas in the District appropriate to the types of businesses targeted for occupancy, based on District-determined priorities, and shall seek sites which have the least prohibitive zoning in order to allow a range of uses.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-71
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-71, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 2-1209.01.
